title: Love Kare: Gokujou Men's Dokuhon! - Gold
original_name: ラブカレ ～極上メンズ読本!～ GOLD
sinopse:
A compilation of 6 sweet stories about finding love and learning how to keep it.

1. Karada no Iinari♡ [Sakou Watari]
2. Oni Kare: Oni Kyoukan Kareshi [Tsukishima Haru]
3. Himitsu no Kin-chan [Iwashita Keiko]
4. Shuuren: Onna wo Suteta Joshikousei, Nara Kyoto e Iku [Monou Yuki]
5. Love+Clothes [Tada Manami]
6. Himikoi: Time Limit [Robico]
